title: Football's next superstar: Why teenage scoring sensation Erling Haaland is the real deal
text:
It’s rare to be caught by surprise when watching football in 2019. Every wonderkid has a YouTube compilation, previews and analysis can be found on the most remote of clubs and the best become famous at a young age thanks to video games, hype and never-ending transfer gossip columns.

When it does happen, it’s thrilling. Watching Lionel Messi dribble from the halfway line, seeing the Brazilian Ronaldo burst past defenders to score for Inter Milan, Cristiano Ronaldo doing ridiculous things on the wing - the very first time we see them, it’s clear magic is happening.

And while it’s important to temper expectations and not get carried away by exciting early performances from young players, it seems...
description: It’s rare to be caught by surprise when watching football in 2019.
